name: Save the Children
description: An NGO working for children's rights, providing education, healthcare, and emergency aid.

name: World Wildlife Fund
description: A leading organization in wildlife conservation and endangered species.

name: Doctors Without Borders
description: Providing medical care to those in crisis, regardless of borders.

name: Greenpeace
description: Campaigning for the environment, promoting peace, and sustainability.

name: Oxfam
description: Fighting global poverty and injustice by providing practical support.

name: UNICEF
description: Promoting the rights and wellbeing of every child, in everything they do.

name: Habitat for Humanity
description: Helping people in need build and improve places to call home.

name: Amnesty International
description: Campaigning for human rights and fighting injustice worldwide.
